God's true commandment-keeping people will be instructed by Him. The true medical missionary will be wise in the 
                                                                           309
treatment of the sick, using the remedies that Nature provides. And then he will look to Christ as the true Healer of disease. The principles of health reform brought into the life of the patient, the use of nature's remedies, and the cooperation of divine agencies in behalf of the suffering, will bring success.
